author: smuzaffar
body:
The problem with `edmPickEvents.py` unit test is that we timeout das command after 15 seconds ( https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/blob/master/PhysicsTools/Utilities/scripts/edmPickEvents.py#L128 ) but the querywe are running takes more than 15s that is why unit test is failing. This PR proposes to add a new optional command-line arg `--das-client-timeout` (default value is 15s) to change the timeout. 

Also unit test now properly prints the error message [a]

Fixes https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/37126
This can be backported to other releases if needed

```
+ edmPickEvents.py --das-client-timeout 15 /Cosmics/Run2011A-v1/RAW 160960:277:10001082,160960:277:10001058,160960:277:10001650
+ cat run_edmCopyPickMerge.sh
DAS query timeout
DAS command: ['dasgoclient', '-query', 'file dataset=/Cosmics/Run2011A-v1/RAW run=160960 lumi=277', '-json']
DAS query error: return code -9
--- Standard output---
[
{"das":{"expire":1647429691,"instance":"prod/global","primary_key":"file.name","record":1,"services":["dbs3:file4dataset_run_lumi"]},"file":[{"name":"/store/data/Run2011A/Cosmics/RAW/v1/000/160/960/049F6443-8E53-E011-A943-003048F117EA.root"}],"qhash":"e3520c0a67318a03b339b02affe9a3e2"}
]

--- Standard error---

--- End ---
+ exit 1

```
title: Fix edmPickEvents.py unit test
